oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood of Co D., 43rd Wisc. Infantry Regiment, USA, written from Johnsonville on October 27. The letter begins on the same page as the October 19th letter. Private Atwood writes of his disappointment at not hearing from "home", his weekly duties, the number of men employed at Johnsonville, construction of the site and its structures, and the materials contained in the various structures. He includes another hand drawn map of the location of storehouses in relation to the river.
